description: A dance learning app that helps users practice Latin dance moves through guided video tutorials and step-by-step lessons. Designed to complement live classes, it makes learning engaging and accessible.

A set of pre-built templates that simplify user research and information architecture. They help users set up studies faster while learning best practices, making research more efficient for both beginners and experts.

A design system created to ensure consistency and accessibility across government education platforms. It provides a structured framework with reusable components and guidelines to streamline digital development.

A centralised platform for teachers to access new assessment standards, subject materials, and updates. Designed for clarity and ease of use, it simplifies navigation and improves access to essential resources.
